about_the_game:
An outside threat appears at Fjor's homeland, a quiet northern island. She's not yet strong enough, but born under Guardian's celestial blessing, she must unlock her inner powers, unite the spirits of ancient heroes and fulfill her duty to protect what's sacred to her people.

Survive, get stronger, and triumph. As you move towards your goal, explore the island's surface and underground: forgotten caves and ominous swamps, gloomy catacombs and sacred ruins, where you shall fight hordes of monsters and discover well-hidden secrets.

Advanced combat system

Tired of one-button combat? Inspired by the best of hack'n'slash genre, Divinum has wide possibilities for you to master and experiment with. Launch enemies into the air, where they are unable to act and escape, but Fjor gets access to unique moves. Unleash unstoppable combos with two distinct primary weapons and special skills. Leave your foes no chance with quick dodges, block and parry!

Impactful collectible equipment

Explore the world, look for secrets and fight bosses to find Runes that meaningfully change how you fight. +5% damage item? You won't find anything this boring in Divinum. Runes can provide anything from solid unique bonuses to modifiers that can completely change how you approach battles — but they may come with trade-offs.

Test your skills and get rewarded

Across the island, ancient evil lies in wait. Challenge the cursed foes of old and claim the rewards.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Divinum is an action sidescroller featuring an intricate combat system and metroidvania elements. Attain the powers of the ancestor spirits, protect your home island from the invaders and uncover its dark secret.
